name: BowBladeGun
description:
BowBladeGun was made in 2 weeks to learn UE5.  Hack and slash through hordes of enemies by using the BowBladeGun efficiently. You can shoot the bow switch into melee combat with its blades and shoot enemies with its guns.

Use WASD to move around

LMB to shoot an arrow with the bow

RMB to shoot both guns

Q to attack with the blades 

E to throw half of the bow. Press E again to teleport 

R to shoot a device which heals you. You can shoot arrows from it.
